name: Web3 token deep research
description: Generates a comprehensive markdown research report about a given cryptocurrency token by gathering web data, summarizing with LLM, and exporting the report.
author: @@official.hanzo

tokenTicker.description: The ticker symbol of the cryptocurrency token

tokenName.description: The full name of the cryptocurrency token

reportContent.description: The full content of the generated markdown report

reportPath.description: The file path to the generated markdown report
